message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $13500. I'm willing to compromise, though! I'd be willing to sell the product to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $14000. How about we meet at $13500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to save some money

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go back down to $13500. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'd be willing to sell the product to you for $14250. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I'm not sure I can go up to $14250. I was thinking more along the lines of $13800. Can you meet me at that price?
